sentences.en: At least 1 year AR accounting and ERP experience.
sentences.cn: 一年以上的应收帐款和ERP的经验.

sentences.en: Be mainly about its development, function and the integration with CAx and ERP.
sentences.cn: 简要介绍了PDM的 发展状况和功能,以及它与CAx和ERP的集成.

sentences.en: ERP systems also enable information to be readily shared across the organization.
sentences.cn: ERP系统也能使信息在整个机构内随时被共享.

sentences.en: Especially the attainment rate of ERP project is very low.
sentences.cn: 特别是ERP项目,成功率非常低.

sentences.en: Experience of an electronically stock controlled environment essential. Experience of ERP System.
sentences.cn: 有使用电子库存管理系统和使用ERP系统的经验.

sentences.en: It also provides the ERP solution for the finance management system.
sentences.cn: 提出了ERP在财务管理系统的解决方案.

sentences.en: Perfect ERP business process according to company business development.
sentences.cn: 依据公司业务的发展,完善ERP流程.

sentences.en: Physical count incoming goods and input the info to the ERP system.
sentences.cn: 负责供应商来料的清点,并同时录入ERP系统.

sentences.en: Procurement Managers, ERP Engineers and other ERP Stakeholders in Purchasing.
sentences.cn: 采购经理, ERP工程师及其他ERP项目相关人员.

sentences.en: Supervise operations of the ERP system and come up with improvement solution.
sentences.cn: 管理ERP系统的运行,并不断提出改进方案.

sentences.en: Testing self - contained, means perfect, keep using ERP sales and production management.
sentences.cn: 检测设备齐全, 手段完善, 采用ERP产销存及生产管理方式.

sentences.en: To fully address the ERP system implementation gets MES neck bottle.
sentences.cn: 彻底解决了ERp系统MES实施 的信息获取瓶颈问题.

sentences.en: Understands the shoesindustry ERP system and 5 S, the ISO quality control system!
sentences.cn: 了解鞋业ERP系统及5S 、 ISO品质管理体系!

sentences.en: What is the best approach for handling ERP source data?
sentences.cn: 从ERP源 系统中抽取数据最好的方法是什么?

sentences.en: With the new ERP systems, this core business functionality is tightly integrated.
sentences.cn: 有了新的erp系统, 这些核心业务功能紧密地结合在一起.

trans.tran_cn: Enterprise Resource Planning企业资源计划，Enterprise Resource Planning,企业资源计划
